mapper.sql: id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resourceId, resourceActionId, roleId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mubs_role_resource ( id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resourceId, resourceActionId, roleId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{resourceId}, #{resourceActionId}, #{roleId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE mubs_role_resource
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
resourceId = #{resourceId},
resourceActionId = #{resourceActionId},
roleId = #{roleId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE mubs_role_resource
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
resourceId = #{map.resourceId},
resourceActionId = #{map.resourceActionId},
roleId = #{map.roleId},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mubs_role_resource ( id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resourceId, resourceActionId, roleId ) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.resourceId}, #{map.resourceActionId}, #{map.roleId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM mubs_role_resource
and id in (#{condition.whereSql})
limit ${offset}, ${rows}

SELECT
FROM mubs_role_resource
AND id like '%#{id}%'
AND creator like '%#{creator}%'
AND createDate like '%#{createDate}%'
AND lastModifier like '%#{lastModifier}%'
AND lastModDate like '%#{lastModDate}%'
AND status like '%#{status}%'
AND resourceId like '%#{resourceId}%'
AND resourceActionId like '%#{resourceActionId}%'
AND roleId like '%#{roleId}%'
